item.description:
Hi All,

A really good band is coming back to this area. The band is called Solid Gold. I am scheduling a meetup at the Bear and Grill in Orange. Come on down and check out the show. I think you will really enjoy the night. The place is really cool.

We will meet at 7:00 for the people who are coming for dinner. Please find me (Steve) to get on the list to sit with us at 6:45. I will then get a table for us for 7.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Solid Gold at the Bear and Grill in Orange.
